values: When someone is inventive, they are good at creating new things.
The inventive student built a robot to help her with her chores.
adj. 发明的；有发明才能的；独出心裁的
adj. 发明的；有发明才能的；独出心裁的

- adj. 有发明才能的；显示创造力的
- n. 发明创造能力，创造性

名 词:  
inventiveness
